page.title: 10Events in Nailsea
page.content: In recent years, one type of event has become very popular in this area..... {Car Boot Sales}or{Boot Sales}as they have come to be called. These are run by various organisations within the Town on behalf of their own funds or in aid of a charity. Car owners may book a car space on the site of the sale for three or four pounds. This entitles them to sell any unwanted goods from the{boot}of their car and to keep their takings. They have the advantage of being able to sell off items which they are unwilling to give away to an ordinary "Jumble Sale" and the organisers profit by the car space fees and do not have to be responsible for any unsold goods after the sale. Most vendors now set up a table or trailer behind their car to display their goods as most car boots are too small.
